hero.title: OUR STORY
hero.subtitle: A Mission Rooted in Family—

intro.paragraph1: The name Legacy Concierge carries a promise — to honor your family's story with the same devotion we bring to our own.
intro.paragraph2: Founded in 2022, Legacy was born from lived experience — from witnessing too many families navigate pain, uncertainty, and inadequate care when their loved ones needed compassion most.
intro.paragraph3: We've felt that heartbreak. We've seen where the system falls short. And we built Legacy Concierge to be the answer. Our mission is simple yet sacred: to deliver elite, compassionate care that upholds dignity, trust, and humanity at every step. Every plan we design, every nurse we select, every partnership we form — all exist to ensure your loved one's journey is met with the reverence it deserves.

hero.quote: Because your family's legacy is more than a story — it's something worth protecting.
hero.imageAlt: Legacy Concierge branded stethoscope representing our commitment to personalized care

bio.paragraph1: Jason Kidushim, Founder and CEO of Legacy Concierge, created this company with one mission: to redefine what care feels like.
bio.paragraph2: His inspiration began with his grandfather — a decorated war hero whose battle with Alzheimer's revealed the deep flaws in our healthcare system. Witnessing that loss of dignity became the catalyst for Jason's life's work: to build a service where no family would ever have to endure that kind of neglect again.
bio.paragraph3: After returning to California, Jason united his decades of leadership in healthcare operations, patient advocacy, and service design to establish Legacy Concierge — a model that blends clinical precision with human connection.
bio.paragraph4: Under his guidance, Legacy has become more than a care provider — it's a movement dedicated to preserving dignity, honoring family, and setting a new standard for home healthcare.
